properties.name: FEED_FORWARD_PROP_TO_PROCESS
properties.description: Comma-separated list of property names indicating which properties in the feed-forward track or detection to consider translating. If the first property listed is present, then that property will be translated. If it's not, then the next property in the list is considered. At most, one property will be translated.

properties.name: SCORE_THRESHOLD
properties.description: The minimum score score which must be met or exceeded. Tags below this threshold are silently discarded.

properties.name: TRANSFORMER_TAGGING_CORPUS
properties.description: Name of a JSON file that describes a tag hierarchy to be used for matching sentences. Will default to the plugin's config folder unless an alternate path to corpus file is specified (i.e. `$MPF_HOME/.../transformer_text_tags_corpus.json`).

properties.name: ENABLE_DEBUG
properties.description: If true, each detection will include a `TEXT [TAG] TRIGGER SENTENCES MATCHES` property for each entry in `TAGS`. The value will be the sentence in the corpus which generated the highest match score for that tag.

actions.name: ARGOS TRANSLATION (WITH FF REGION) ACTION
actions.description: Uses Argos Translation to perform translation on feed-forward tracks and detections.

actions.name: ARGOS TRANSLATION TEXT FILE ACTION
actions.description: Uses Argos Translation to perform translation on a plain text file.

tasks.name: ARGOS TRANSLATION (WITH FF REGION) TASK
tasks.description: Uses Argos Translate to perform translation on feed-forward tracks and detections.

tasks.name: ARGOS TRANSLATION TEXT FILE TASK
tasks.description: Uses Argos Translate to perform translation on a plain text file.

pipelines.name: ARGOS TRANSLATION TEXT FILE PIPELINE
pipelines.description: Uses Argos Translate to perform translation on a plain text file.
